content: As a freelancer, I have worked with a lot of different agencies and startups in New York, and it is always informative to be able to take a peak in all of these different work places. Despite all of the advances in working conditions in the design/tech world, what I find to be most important is that the company respects and allows for a space to create your own life. Giving you a balanced amout of work so that you can leave on time and pursue you own creative endeavors. I think this recharges us and allows us to bring the same enthusiasm to work the next day. An employer asking for it all will just generate resentment in the end.
